dialogue.text: The sounds of voices and instruments filled Enzync City's streets under the nighttime glow.
The sound catches the attention of a young woman, who was on her way home from a long late shift, and hoped to indulge in the late night rhythms.
Though to her surprise, the music had faded as soon as it had had arrived.
Huh? Where did everyone go? I could've sworn I heard the Night Crew just playing.
Phooey. Maybe I missed them... but how did they leave so fast?
Luck really hasn't been on my side this month.
Well… I’m already here. Gotta make the most of the remaining nightfall.
Woah, hey! You making that sound? Don't know how you're doing it, but you've got my groove spot on!
Not much of a talker? That's all cool.
Let's just keep this groove up, then! Follow my lead, kay?
Looks like I've got a little bit o' luck after all!
